snippet.title: New life of Aged Town-Official Game Video
snippet.description: "New life of Aged Town" is an "elder care" themed game with rich storytelling, a warm and comforting hand-drawn style, and casual gameplay. As the manager of "Elderly Town," you'll transform this declining town into a civilized and livable city for seniors. In the process, you'll meet a variety of elderly residents, listen to their thoughts, and experience the myriad facets of life.
